thread.section_title: Sunglasses Shop Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.sunglasses-shop.co.uk
thread.title: LuckyLuke

author: LuckyLuke
title: LuckyLuke
text:
I ordered quite a few sunglasses in this shop in the past and every single time I was extremely satisfied with the whole process.
The prices are usually great.
The delivery is very fast and always free of charge, even to other countries!
The customer service replies very fast and always very friendly.
And I never had a problem with any of the glasses which I ordered. All of the purchased glasses get checked before they are sent!
So all in all a very good shop for any kind of glasses!
